name: School Project - Plane Game
description:
THIS WAS A SCHOOL PROJECT MADE IN LIKE 2 DAYS

----------------------------------------

Instructions in-game, but W and S to change forward speed, A and D to Turn, Left Shift and Left Control to rise/lower, R to restart a level, escape to quit!

----------------------------------------

This game was made from reusing assets from some of my tutorial projects and making something new out of it, with plenty of new additions.
